All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, QueryResultDisplay, QueryResultHandler, java.io.Serializable
public class SkycatCatalogTree
extends CatalogTree
implements QueryResultHandler

Used to display a hierarchy of catalogs.
